## CreateCookieJarOptions.allowSpecialUseDomain property

Accepts [special-use domains](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6761) such as `local`<!-- -->. This is not in the standard, but is used sometimes on the web and is accepted by most browsers. It is also useful for testing purposes.

Defaults to `true` if not specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
allowSpecialUseDomain?: boolean | undefined;
```
